organic.title: Cyberpunk 2077 Follow-up, codenamed Project Orion
organic.snippet: Project Orion is currently in the early stages of development, with studio veterans previously involved in Cyberpunk 2077 and its spy-thriller Phantom Liberty expansion spearheading the project, including Gabriel Amatangelo (Game Director), Paweł Sasko (Associate Game Director), Igor Sarzyński ...

organic.title: Game size & Storage — Cyberpunk 2077
organic.snippet: The game is approximately 59 GB. If downloaded digitally, it can be installed either on the internal storage or a SD card. The physical version runs directly from the game card. Note that future updates and additional language packs must be installed on internal storage or a SD for both digital and physical ...

organic.snippet: You may also try verifying game files, as described here. If any of the above won't help, reinstall your GPU drivers. To do so completely follow these steps: Download newest drivers for your GPU, but don't install them yet. Download Display Driver Uninstaller and run it to remove previous versions of drivers. organic.title: How do I transfer my save file to the next-gen update?
organic.snippet: If you are playing the PlayStation 4 version of the game, you will be able to select one save file to upload to the cloud. Once you launch the PlayStation 5 version, you will then be able to download it. This method allows you to transfer between different devices, doesn't require a PlayStation Plus subscription ...

organic.title: Technical Support — CD PROJEKT RED
organic.snippet: The version number can be found in the top right corner of the main menu after starting the game. 1.63 and below: Version Number can be found in the main menu, bottom left-ish. 2.21 (Latest) 2.2 2.13 1.63. Other. If you encountered any issues on an older version of the game, make sure to update it first.

The save files can be found in the following location: %userprofile%\Saved Games\CD Projekt Red\Cyberpunk 2077. English · Русский · Deutsch · Polski · Português (BR) ...

organic.title: I cannot connect to GWENT servers
organic.snippet: Please make sure to have Overlay enabled both for the platform and GWENT itself. GOG Galaxy: go to Settings in GOG Galaxy -> Game features -> In-game features -> Enable Overlay. In order to enable Overlay for GWENT, right click on GWENT in the GOG library -> Manage installation -> Configure.

organic.title: SmartFrame and the Gallery feature — Cyberpunk 2077
organic.snippet: [PC] Can I import pictures from outside the game? The pictures from your screenshot folder will show up in the in-game Gallery, as long as they're in the .png format and they're in one of the supported aspect ratios: 16:9, 2.35:1, 4:3, 9:16, 4:5 or 2:3.
